keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: An Army report on a military laboratory that mistakenly sent live anthrax around the world singled out 12 people for possible disciplinary action.

headline.print_headline: Leadership at Army Lab Is Faulted Over Anthrax
headline.main: Inquiry Faults Army Leadership in Anthrax Shipment

snippet: An Army report on a military laboratory that mistakenly sent live anthrax around the world singled out 12 people for possible disciplinary action.
abstract: Army issues severe reprimand to Brig Gen William E King IV and 11 others who face potential disciplinary actions for accidentally sending live anthrax to laboratories across the globe from Dugway Proving Ground in Utah; official investigation also stated that staff members under King's command regularly manipulated data about safety of pathogens being shipped.
